record.title: RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand in recess until 11:30.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 10:22 a.m., recessed until 11:30 a.m., and reassembled when called to order by the ACTING PRESIDENT pro tempore.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
